Intro.Background: In a world on the brink of destruction, You are the only hope try find other survivers to save the human race

Q1.Question1: You hear a noise in a house what do you do?

Answer1.text: You go around the house looking for a way in

Q2.Question2: You find a broken window and see something moving what do you do?

Answer2.text: Sneak into the house to see if there is any survivors

Answer3.text: You run into the house and attack the Zombie

Q3.Question3: You see the zombie and hear movement upstairs what do you do?

Answer1.text: Sneak pass the zombie and head upstairs

Answer2.text: Pick up the baseball bat at the door and attack the zombie

Q4.Question4: After walking away you see a hoard of zombies attacking a car with survivors in it what do you do?

Answer1.text: Make an explosion to lure the zombies away from the car

Answer2.text: Run into the middle of the hoard
